entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Local snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 late this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023
